explanation: [0-0] On a yellow table, there's a white plate with peeled garlic cloves suspended above it.
[0-2] All the garlic cloves are poured into the plate, followed by olive oil.
[0-2] All the garlic cloves are poured into the plate, followed by olive oil.
[2-5] The scene then switches to show the fried garlic cloves, now a tempting golden yellow, sprinkled with herbs and immersed in oil.

[5-11] Next, the scene cuts to a blender where someone is adding a pat of butter. The roasted garlic cloves and garlic oil are also poured into the blender. Then, fresh herbs and salt are added. The blender starts working, mixing all the ingredients together. After blending, a spoon scoops up the garlic butter sauce, revealing its delicate texture.
